article: This is Wang Ping's Day. He's a young worker. His job is carrying coal . He thinks that's great. Wang Ping's Day 5:10 a. m. Don't work 5:20 a. m. Go home by car 5:30 a. m. Take a shower 5:40 a. m. Eat breakfast. 6:00 a. m. Go to bed. 5:00 p.m. Get up. 5:10 p.m. Buy vegetables or other things for breakfast 6:00 p.m. Have a big dinner. 6:30~7:30p.m. Watch news on TV. 7:40 p.m. Leave home and go to work
questions: When does Wang Ping have breakfast?
Where does he have his breakfast?
